Comes a man? It is! The Freeman!

The classic sequel to the popular original Half-Life.  Many of the things we loved about the original are back, with new puzzles and many hours of gameplay.  The game may be old now and graphically inferior to modern games, but the storyline and the gameplay make it worth the money.
A very well made game. Challenging with a great story. Not much here that anyone who love FPS's wouldn't like.

The Citadel was mind blowing.

had this game on my other account but that got hacked :( its a great game and a classic.

Half-Life 2 is a really good game! It makes me have to think about every move I take, if it's a puzzle or in a combat fight. I never really tried any combat that Half-Life 2 has like in forever and I just really like it. This game does have some bad things. Some stuff in the game is really hard to find, this includes stuff to move forward in the game. Once I complete a hard puzzle, I feel like my third eye just opened a bit more. Overall it's a really good game and you should try it if you haven't already!

Fun game. Great story. Not demanding at all considering it was made in 2004.
9.5/10 would play again
You are not a real first shootier gamer until you play HL.

Like a fine wine, gets better with age.

quite possibly one of the best singleplayer FPS games of all time. This game's story telling and style really stands out from other FPS games, and is even better than a lot of current FPS stories. The graphics have aged surprisingly well too. Although there are now games that have a lot better graphics, this game (especially for releasing in 2004) had some amazing graphics and visuals.
